mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT c.id, c.lon, c.lat, CONCAT( c.detail_address, c.`name` ) AS 'name' FROM t_community AS c LEFT JOIN t_user_house AS h ON h.community_id = c.id WHERE c.deleted = 0 AND h.deleted = 0 AND h.check_status = 1 AND h.uid = #{uid} AND c.city_id = #{cityId}
mapper.delete: update t_house_lease set deleted = 1,update_time = now() where id = #{id} and uid = #{uid} and deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.house_id, l.house_city_id, r.`name` as houseCityName, l.house_community_id, l.house_address, l.house_square_meter, l.house_type_code, l.house_direction_id, l.house_floor, l.house_price, l.house_image_id, l.house_leasedeposit_id, c.house_const_name AS houseLeaseDeposit, l.house_leasetype_id, d.house_const_name AS houseLeaseType, l.house_title, l.house_introduce, l.appellation, l.house_contact FROM t_house_lease AS l LEFT JOIN t_house_const AS c ON l.house_leasedeposit_id = c.house_const_code AND c.house_const_type = 1 LEFT JOIN t_house_const AS d ON l.house_leasetype_id = d.house_const_code AND d.house_const_type = 10 LEFT JOIN t_region as r on l.house_city_id = r.id WHERE l.id = #{houseId} and uid = #{uid} and l.deleted = 0

SELECT l.id, l.house_contact, l.appellation, l.house_address, l.house_image_id, l.house_price, l.house_unit, l.house_leasedeposit_id, l.house_leasemode_id, l.house_title, l.house_type_code, l.house_square_meter, l.house_floor, l.house_direction_id, l.house_advantage_id, l.house_introduce, l.house_furniture_id, l.house_lat, l.house_lon, l.bedroom_type, l.lease_require_id, l.room_facilities_id, l.common_facilities_id, l.decoration_type_id, l.roommate_expect_id, l.roommate_sex, c.house_const_name AS houseLeaseMode, d.house_const_name AS houseLeaseDeposit, e.house_const_name as decorationType FROM t_house_lease AS l LEFT JOIN t_house_const AS c ON l.house_leasemode_id = c.house_const_code AND c.house_const_type = 11 LEFT JOIN t_house_const AS d ON l.house_leasedeposit_id = d.house_const_code AND d.house_const_type = 1 LEFT JOIN t_house_const AS e ON l.decoration_type_id = d.house_const_code AND d.house_const_type = 18 WHERE l.id = #{houseId} and l.deleted = 0

SELECT l.id, l.house_title, l.house_address, l.house_price, l.house_unit, l.house_image_id, l.house_type_code, l.bedroom_type, c.house_const_name as houseLeaseMode, h.house_const_name as houseLeaseDeposit FROM t_house_lease AS l left join t_house_const as c on l.house_leasemode_id = c.house_const_code and c.house_const_type = 11 and c.deleted = 0 left join t_house_const as h on l.house_leasedeposit_id = h.house_const_code and h.house_const_type = 1 and c.deleted = 0 WHERE l.uid = #{query.uid} and l.deleted = 0 ORDER BY l.create_time desc LIMIT #{page},#{size}

SELECT h.id, concat(h.building,h.unit,h.floor,h.door) as mergeName
FROM t_user_house AS uh RIGHT JOIN t_house AS h ON uh.house_id = h.id WHERE uh.check_status = 1 and uh.uid = #{uid} and uh.community_id = #{communityId} and uh.deleted = 0 and h.type = 4 and uh.deleted = 0

SELECT l.id, l.house_title, l.house_address, l.house_advantage_id, l.house_price, l.house_unit, l.house_square_meter, l.house_image_id, l.house_type_code, l.house_lon, l.house_lat, l.house_furniture_id, l.house_leasemode_id, l.bedroom_type FROM t_house_lease AS l WHERE l.deleted = 0 and l.house_title LIKE concat('%',#{query.searchText},'%') OR l.house_address LIKE concat('%',#{query.searchText},'%') LIMIT #{page},#{size}

SELECT l.id, l.house_title, l.house_address, l.house_advantage_id, l.house_price, l.house_unit, l.house_square_meter, l.house_image_id, l.house_type_code, l.house_lon, l.house_lat, l.house_furniture_id, l.house_leasemode_id, l.bedroom_type FROM t_house_lease AS l WHERE l.deleted = 0 and l.house_price = #{query.searchText} LIMIT #{page},#{size}

SELECT c.`name` AS communityName, CONCAT( h.building, h.unit, h.floor, h.door ) AS houseAddress FROM t_community AS c LEFT JOIN t_house AS h ON c.id = h.community_id AND c.id = #{houseCommunityId} AND h.id = #{houseId} WHERE c.deleted = 0 AND h.deleted = 0
